title: Network Security
summary: Firewalls, IDS/IPS, VPN, proxy servers, port scanning, and packet analysis. Dive deep into network security technologies and practices.  Learn about firewalls (stateful and stateless), Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) and Intrusion Prevention Systems (IPS), Virtual Private Networks (VPN), proxy servers, port scanning techniques, and packet analysis using tools like Wireshark. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.
detailedSummary:
Firewalls, IDS/IPS, VPN, proxy servers, port scanning, and packet analysis. Dive deep into network security technologies and practices.  Learn about firewalls (stateful and stateless), Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) and Intrusion Prevention Systems (IPS), Virtual Private Networks (VPN), proxy servers, port scanning techniques, and packet analysis using tools like Wireshark. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.

This topic provides essential knowledge for understanding cybersecurity at the Secondary level. Through comprehensive study, students will develop a deep understanding of the concepts, principles, and applications related to Network Security. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts.
